You are absolutely free with the RED ones. Contact the developer in the "assignee" column if you wanna help in a YELLOW status feature. (IRC or the mailing list are your friends here) This document has the purpose of informing users as to in which direction rekonq is going. This is not a guarantee of what will be done!
